11.content:
Yeah that's right, her. (http://www.vgcats.com)

Might I suggest reading Scott's comics before making chapters? And keeping her in her jeans-jacket outfit?

Anyways, to avoid any form of generic plotlines, why not use videogame items and powerups as the base of how this will work out?

Here's a few examples.

15.title: The Other Choices You'd Choose.

info.brief_description: Inflation and Weight Gain of the strangest kind!
info.description:
Ok everyone, thanks for coming and let us begin. For the brief period I have been here, I've noticed that only a certain group of characters (Most noticably the females) have been subjected to this Inflation/Weight Gain craze. Basically ommiting the others that aren't used, I now give you an area to do so. Change in the 'Another Character' section as you please.
Rules:
No sex. No clearer than that, nudity and clothing rippage is ok though.
No vore. Save that for another interactive.
No massive weight gains. (Ya know, "OMG I GAIN 1000000 pounds!)
Popping. Wait for a few chapters
Pooping. Just no.
N00b posts shall be deleted with avengance!
Lastly, no storylines that go on WAY past the mark of an ending.
Let us begin.
